member.name: CRL_INFO
member.summary: The CRL_INFO structure contains the information of a certificate revocation list (CRL).

summary.para: Version number of the CRL. Currently defined version numbers are shown in the following table.

member.name: CRL_INFO.SignatureAlgorithm
member.summary: structure that contains the object identifier (OID) of a signature algorithm and any associated additional parameters.

member.name: CRL_INFO.Issuer
member.summary: A BLOB structure that contains an encoded certificate issuer's name.

member.name: CRL_INFO.ThisUpdate
member.summary: Indication of the date and time of the CRL's published. If the time is after 1950 and before 2050, it is UTC-time encoded as an 8-byte date/time precise to seconds with a 2-digit year (that is, YYMMDDHHMMSS plus 2 bytes). Otherwise, it is generalized-time encoded as an 8-byte year precise to milliseconds with a 4-byte year.

member.name: CRL_INFO.NextUpdate
member.summary: Indication of the date and time for the CRL's next available scheduled update. If the time is after 1950 and before 2050, it is UTC-time encoded as an 8-byte date/time precise to seconds with a 2-digit year (that is, YYMMDDHHMMSS plus 2 bytes). Otherwise, it is generalized-time encoded as an 8-byte date time precise to milliseconds with a 4-byte year.

member.name: CRL_INFO.cCRLEntry
member.summary: Number of elements in the rgCRLEntry array.

member.name: CRL_INFO.rgCRLEntry
member.summary: Array of pointers to structures. Each of these structures represents a revoked certificate.

member.name: CRL_INFO.cExtension
member.summary: Number of elements in the rgExtension array.

member.name: CRL_INFO.rgExtension
member.summary: Array of pointers to structures, each holding information about the CRL.
